name: accessibility
description: Issue related to accessibility.

name: bug
description: Issue that can be reproduced.

name: can't reproduce
description: Issues that can't be reproduce.

name: cherry picked
description: PR has been added to the next release.

name: design
description: Needs design feedback. [auto]

name: enhancement
description: Improvements that slightly enhance existing functionality and are fast to implement.

name: epic
description: Container issue with high-level description of work that will be done in sprint.

name: feature branch ðŸš€
description: Multiple PRs will target this branch before it's merged to core.

name: good first issue
description: Good first issue to start with (community contributions are welcome).

name: hacktoberfest
description: Small issues for those interested in participating in Hacktoberfest.

name: has pull request
description: Issue that has pull request.

name: i18n
description: Issues related to translation.

name: needs cherry picking
description: Commits from this PR also needs to be added to current release branch.

name: onboarding wizard
description: Issue related to onboarding wizard.

name: performance
description: Issues related to performance (code / DB / web performance).

name: priority: critical
description: The plugin or the store are unusable, it affects a significant number of customers.

name: priority: high
description: Important, but no one will go out of business.

name: priority: low
description: Nice-to-haves and niche cases.

name: privacy
description: GDPR / Privacy related.

name: question
description: Issue pending decision (not for support requests).

name: refactor
description: Code needs refactoring.

name: status: approved
description: PRs that have been approved and ready to be merged.

name: status: blocked
description: Issue or PR is blocked by external factor.

name: status: changelog added
description: Mark all PRs that have their changelog entries added to readme.txt

name: status: in progress
description: This is being worked on.

name: status: needs changelog
description: Mark all PRs that have not had their changelog entries added. [auto]

name: status: needs docs
description: Needs explanation in release notes, dev blog, or documentation.

name: status: needs feedback
description: Needs feedback from the author/developers.

name: status: needs review
description: PR that needs review. [auto]

name: status: needs testing instructions
description: PRs that have not had testing instructions added to the wiki. [auto]

name: status: testing instructions added
description: PRs that has had testing instructions added to the wiki.

name: templating
description: Issue related to WooCommerce templates.

name: votes needed
description: Feature request awaiting community feedback. [auto]

name: wccom
description: Issues related to communication with woocommerce.com.

name: won't fix
description: Issue that will not be fixed at this time.

name: wordpress
description: Upstream issue that needs to be fixed in WordPress core.
